text: {| |} USS Devastator (MCM-6) is an of the United States Navy. Construction of Devastator began on 9 February 1987 when her keel was laid at Peterson Shipbuilders in Sturgeon Bay, Wisconsin. Construction was finished and the vessel was launched on 11 June 1988. Devastator was commissioned into the US Navy on 6 October 1990. ==References== * ==External links== * Official page Category:Avenger-class mine countermeasures ships Category:Active minehunters of the United States Category:1988 ships Category:Ships built by Peterson Builders
title: USS Devastator (MCM-6)
